messages.messageText:
May 1 : Friday
തിഥി: അഷ്ടമി (up to 1:27 pm)
നക്ഷത്രം: ആയില്യം

May 2 : Saturday
തിഥി: അഷ്ടമി (up to 1:27 pm)
നക്ഷത്രം: ആയില്യം
May 3 ...
And it was you...honestly it was your cousin?... I appreciate you... your cousin(?)... let her know
Will you say all those things about Indians ?
I don't care. yeah! Feel free. Go outside. talk about slumdog. I don't give a fuck. haaaa!
How sensitive do you you think I'm. haaaa! no one cares. We don't all have time to be serious in this world.I'm going to die soon.
I'm Hindu. So, I get another life. You don't.
She still didn't get it. Barack Obama...whatsuup ?
They hate you. They love me
Everybody's on my side. Nobody's on your side.
Everybody here...Feel love
Everybody treat you like you aint shit
Everybody's like oh shit ! she's angry for no reason... getting sensitive for no reason
This aint goddamn Spellmen...alright
quick tip - Spellmen was some dean in some university who had to resign over racist comments.
I knew you went to a HBC... I knew she went to a Historically Black College. That's the only place you are getting this kind of attitude about me.
Relax son, I'm not white, I dont owe u anything...What guilt even you have got !!!
Your friends are embarrassed for you. Seeing your friend there...probably getting a holiday...after the show she's like,this is gettign rough for her.
You don't care that no one likes you. Wht kind of a horrible self awareness you have.
They clearly love me more than you. That doesnt bother you?
So, you are that kind of girl who get 1% or the 2% of votes and be like, you know what...I don't care what anybody thinks about me.
I only know nobody like me
Oh mh God! what's taking so long... to get to the point... right...
That's why you are in the audience...coz, noone cares what you think
Society has deemed it this way
Society decided I'm here ...u are there...that's what it is
you are a comedian
yeah! that's right...My job is to be funny.... my job is to cater to your stupid sensitivities...
I'm sorry someone was racist to you when you were 8.
I grew up in Texas after 9/11. And I promise that I took it just like you
